feed.title: Proposal: OP_STARK_VERIFY - Native STARK Proof Verification in Bitcoin Script

entry.title: Proposal: OP_STARK_VERIFY - Native STARK Proof Verification in Bitcoin Script
entry.summary: The sender acknowledges an oversight in their previous communication and commits to providing a more detailed update. They express a desire for feedback once the additional information is shared, indicating an openness to constructive criticism and a willingness to improve upon their initial message. This exchange underscores the importance of thorough communication and the value of collaborative input in refining ideas or projects.
